# backgroundEffect

**Instance Property**

The visual effect to apply to the button.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundEffect: UIVisualEffect? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assigning a visual effect object to this property adds that effect to the background of the action button.

## Configuring the action’s appearance

- **style**: The style applied to the action button.
- **UITableViewRowAction.Style**: Constants that specify the appearance of action buttons.
- **title**: The title of the action button.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the action button.
